mapper.sql: id as id , creator as creator , createDate as createDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , lastModDate as lastModDate , status as status , resId as resId , displayName as displayName , colId as colId , orderNum as orderNum , width as width , editoptions as editoptions , edittype as edittype , unformat as unformat , description as description , moduleName as moduleName
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO mubs_resource_grid ( creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, resId, displayName, colId, orderNum, width, editoptions, edittype, unformat, description, moduleName ) VALUES ( #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{status}, #{resId}, #{displayName}, #{colId}, #{orderNum}, #{width}, #{editoptions}, #{edittype}, #{unformat}, #{description}, #{moduleName} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID

INSERT INTO mubs_resource_grid ( creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, resId, displayName, colId, orderNum, width, editoptions, edittype, unformat, description, moduleName ) VALUES ( #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.resId}, #{map.displayName}, #{map.colId}, #{map.orderNum}, #{map.width}, #{map.editoptions}, #{map.edittype}, #{map.unformat}, #{map.description}, #{map.moduleName} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE mubs_resource_grid
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
status = #{status},
resId = #{resId},
displayName = #{displayName},
colId = #{colId},
orderNum = #{orderNum},
width = #{width},
editoptions = #{editoptions},
edittype = #{edittype},
unformat = #{unformat},
description = #{description},
moduleName = #{moduleName},
WHERE id = #{id}

unformat = #{map.unformat},

creator = #{update.creator},

${nativeSql}
